de.vinado.boot.secrets

Class SecretsEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.vinado.boot.secrets.SecretsEnvironment

  • public class SecretsEnvironment
extends Object
    A wrapper around ConfigurableEnvironment which loads secrets and applies them to SecretPropertiesPropertySource.
    Author:
    Vincent Nadoll
